text: Scott Raynor (May 23, 1978) is an American drummer. He was Blink-182's drummer from 1992 to 1998, when he was told to leave the band. Now Raynor is a drummer for the bands Isinglass and One Track Mind. When asked about being removed from Blink-182 in an interview,Interview with Scott C-Rogalski this is what Raynor said: == Discography == === Blink-182 === * Flyswatter (1993) * Demo #2 (1993) * Short Bus (1994) * Cheshire Cat (1994) * Buddha Promo (1994) * They Came to Conquer... Uranus (1995) * Dude Ranch (1997) *Buddha (1998) === ISINGLASS === * ISINGLASS(1999) * New Millennium (2000) === One Track Mind === * Music for Dummies (2003) == References == Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American drummers Category:American guitarists Category:American punk musicians Category:Musicians from California Category:Blink-182 members
title: Scott Raynor
